alert.note: Alert for Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 1:58PM PDT until April 04 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Tulelake, Klamath Falls and some areas east of Klamath Falls in Klamath County including portions of Highway 140. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties
